attributes.action: ensure that Mr & Mrs Blair pay rent for their time spent at Chequers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr & Mrs Blair are moving out of 10 Downing Street on 27 June 2007 and their new home in Connaught Square is not yet ready. 

They have been given free use of Chequers (the usual country home for current prime ministers). Chequers costs 1738 pounds per day to run.

The Blair family should pay the full cost of their stay at Chequers and should not be allowed to stay for free.

For more information, see the article in The Independent "'Homeless' Blairs will stay at Chequers after he leaves office", 23 June 2007.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
